Subject: Application for Product Manager Position at Reclaim

Dear Subhash Karri,

I am writing to express my enthusiasm for the Product Manager position at Reclaim. As a passionate and driven student with a robust background in product development and blockchain technology, I believe I am well-suited for this role.

My previous internship in blockchain development has equipped me with the skills to create decentralized applications and smart contracts, which aligns perfectly with Reclaim's focus on verifiable credentials. This experience has not only deepened my technical expertise but also ignited my passion for leveraging blockchain technology to enhance user experiences.

In addition to my technical skills, my hands-on experience in product and business development has honed my ability to validate, build, and scale innovative solutions. I have successfully developed side projects and SaaS products during my college years, which has provided me with a strong understanding of the product lifecycle and the importance of user-centric design.

I am particularly drawn to Reclaim's mission of making web traffic verifiable. The ability for users to generate claims on their data and control how these claims are shared resonates with my belief in empowering individuals through technology. I am eager to contribute my knowledge of compliance requirements and best practices in the background verification industry to help drive your projects forward.

I am confident that my unique blend of technical expertise, entrepreneurial spirit, and commitment to innovation will make me a valuable asset to your team. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to Reclaim's mission and help shape the future of background verification.

Thank you for considering my application. I hope to hear from you soon.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Contact Information]  
[Your LinkedIn Profile] (if applicable)
